pkgmetadata.longdescription: ********************************Arcam IP Control********************************This module support controlling an arcam fmj received over it's network.It's built mainly for use with home-assistant project, but should workfor other projects as well.Status______.. image:: https://github.com/elupus/arcam_fmj/actions/workflows/python-package.yml/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/elupus/arcam_fmj/actionsModule======Code to set volume and source using library... code-block:: python async def run(): host = '192.168.0.2' port = '50000' zone = 1 volume = 50 source = SourceCodes.PVR client = Client(host, port) async with ClientContext(client): state = State(client, zone) await state.set_volume(volume) await state.set_source(source) loop = asyncio.get_event_loop() loop.run_until_complete (run())Console=======The module contains a commandline utility to test and request data fromcalled ``arcam-fmj``.Code to set volume and source using console... code-block:: bash arcam-fmj state --host 192.168.0.2 --port 50000 --source 5 --volume 50
